body: I wan to be one of the girls

This mans art style is top tier, but some of his works are not for the faint of heart. Most if not all of his works have a Mind break tag even though the site does not say. Imo this work might be one of the darkest ones ive seen from this guy, Sure the slave stuff im quite used to on this site, but near the end where they were going to dispose used girls either via a taxidermy job (literally killing them stuffing them with something possibly tuning them into a sex doll of sorts) or sending them to the meat grinder and them possibly burning the remains so there wouldnt be any evidence. The thought alone is quite brutal and almost saddening, even though this is just some drawings i cant help but feel bad for these girls in the world Ratatat has created. TL:DR: Slaves is bearable, Meat grinder is immediate turnoff.

That shit aside, I can't help but examine the contours and line art of ratatat, his/her characters' proportions and anatomy are well drawn, other than the usual big tits they always draw on every women, its all great body, proportions (anatomy wise) just the mentality I have as an artist, but who asked

@Jeminiwise Normally I like to give the benefit of the doubt since its the internet and all but Jesus, that comment down there was quite insensitive, you sounded more like a feminist and not the good kind, probably just some guy with identity issues who just hides behind the mask of a "lesbian" stop acting like some buncha hoes

@JeminiWise I will not suppose anything but I really can't even imagine you talking something like that (or close) to these femdom mangas out there lol. And even thought I disagree with u im not here to fight im just saying this bc this is one of the few times that I've read the comment section and you comment seemed like very hateful u know . But Thats all lol
